title: TikTok Scraper Input
description: Input schema for scraping TikTok data using tiktok-scraper.

type.title: Scrape type
type.description: Type of TikTok feed to scrape.

query.title: Query
query.description: Hashtag name, username, music ID, or video URL depending on selected type.

number.title: Number of posts
number.description: Number of posts to scrape. Use 0 to scrape all available posts.

filetype.title: Output file type
filetype.description: Output file format for scraped metadata.

sessionFile.title: Session file path
sessionFile.description: Path to a file containing TikTok session cookies, one per line.

proxy.title: Proxy type
proxy.description: Proxy configuration. Use RESIDENTIAL to enable Apify Residential Proxy.
